channel.title: How much would you have to be paid to
channel.description:
Well think about it ... how much would you have to be payed to suck off a man.
Please vote and post how much you think the lowest you would go, im sure if someone ofered me alot of money i would do it.
Post away!
obviously doesn't apply to girls.

item.title: How much would you have to be paid to
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Cunit:

I realy wouldint Idk because im christian and was taught that HomoSexuality or anything Homo Is a Eternal Sin so i wouldint take that chance

Look at it this way…

Based on the Christian Religion God made everything, right? The heavens, earth, etc.
God also made Man.

If god, the creator of Man, thought that being Gay was a sin, why would he make it a possibility? If he didn’t want such to happen then why couldn’t he have just made it that man and woman will only ever like each other?

If he never thought of such ever happening and never fixed it, he mustn’t have thought it be a big deal, right? And if he classified it a Sin upon his own creation for a flaw he made himself then we have one stupid God.

Maybe those who developed the Christian Religion thought that since god made Adam and Eve first that being Gay is a sin. In that case, are they judging gods intelligence and mocking his creation? So are they then really worshippers of God? If they were true worshipers of God they would respect his decisions and what he made possible, wouldn’t they?

People see Gays as different because that’s what the Christian Community has stood by for their entire existence. It’s ok to have an opinion on whether or not you like them, but they are still the same as you, so really, believing it is wrong is an insult to God, an insult to yourself.

It’s all a contradiction, when you think thoroughly into it.
But, what if there isn’t a God? How did we get here? No-one knows. But the fact that it is possible and uncontrollable proves the fact that it is not a Sin.

It’s like saying those with brown hair are Sinners and go to Hell.
They don’t chose their hair color, they can’t.

So, tell me: Why is being Gay a sin?

Read full topic
